title: Client keeps crashing when trying to install
body: I haven't played LoL in at least 2 years, so I decided to get it again and play some. The launcher will download the game, then goes on to install/patch it, then crashes. When I start up the client, it goes through the whole process again. And ideas on what to do?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried [reinstalling league](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends#section-windows) completely?

Could you also [perform a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq7) and let me know if that helps.
Now it's giving me the RADS error

Could you try the following (One by one) and let me know if anything resolves the issue.

* Restart your computer, then restart the patcher process and let it sit.
* Go to your Riot Games/RADS/System folder under your default install path, right click and run rads_user_kernel.exe as Admin.
* Try deleting your LoL_Air_Client folder (the default install path for this folder is C:\Riot Games\RADS\Projects) and then repatching.
* See [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) article, about changing to a public DNS.
* Hit the Windows button and in the search bar type "cmd" and hit "OK". In the new window, type;
  * netsh winsock reset
  * then hit enter and restart your computer.
* Replace /RADS/system/rads_user_kernel.exe, with [this file](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/releases/live/system/rads_user_kernel.exe).

I've tried all the options, and none work. I'm already on public wifi in my barracks, so I have no control over DNS, and I can't reset the winsock because it needs to be done as an admin, something I don't know how to do.
If your DNS is being controlled at the router level and you're unable to change it yourself then I don't know what to tell you, it's a high possibility that that's your main issue here.
So there's no way I can play league?

You could try using a VPN, there's many services out there that offer both free and paid VPN services. Look up some.

One of the easiest to use/most common is [hotspotshield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/)
Not even hotspotshield works. Are there any other options??

There's nothing more I can suggest, could you [submit a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) and include information about everything you've already tried and a link to this thread, they might have some further suggestions.
